# error-message-explainer

Explain compiler/runtime errors in plain language. Use when a junior developer needs help understanding an error message.

## Quick Facts
- id: `error-message-explainer--e0aa08743b`
- worth_using_score: `30/100`
- tags: `ci`
- source: `codex_skills`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/.codex/skills/error-message-explainer/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Restate the error in simple terms.
- Point to the most likely offending line or call.
- Provide one or two possible fixes.
